summary: Surface transportation operations—including rail and mass transit—are vulnerable to terrorism and other threats. TSA determined that 127 surface transportation operations are at high risk because of their location or other reasons. Their owner/operators are required to develop security training programs to help employees address potential security threats, and must submit the programs for TSA's review. title: Surface Transportation: TSA Implementation of Security Training Requirement
